name: Dark Memory Escape
description:
Hi, We are delighted to share our new game with you :)

Game Name: Dark Memory Escape

Description:   There is no one to help you out and could not go home but to seek a way out. Find the related objects and solve the puzzles to escape out of the abandoned company from your dark memory. Good luck and have fun!

Game Page: http://www.freeroomescape.com/dark-memory-escape/

Walkthrough: 

Thanks for supporting our game, we will continue to make more fun and addicting free games :)

Cheers,

Free Room Escape
